Package elements

Class Camera

java.lang.Object
elements.Camera
public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
class to represent camera's view of the scene

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private double _distance
    the distance between the (point of the) camera to the view
    private double _height
    the height of the picture
    private Point3D _p0
    _p0: point of the camera
    private Vector _vRight
    _vRight: right vector from the point of the camera
    private Vector _vTo
    _vTo: vector from the point of the camera to the view
    private Vector _vUp
    _vUp: up vector from the point of the camera
    private double _width
    the width of the picture

    • constructRay

      public Ray constructRay​(int nX, int nY, int j, int i)
      construct that created the ray to pixel i*j
      Parameters:
      nX - amount of the pixels from left to right
      nY - amount of the pixels from bottom to top
      j - current parameter from left to right
      i - current parameter from bottom to top
      Returns:
      the ray to the pixel
